item.description:
Memorial Day Boardgames

What: Open Board Gaming with the Southern NH Open Board Game Group

Cost: Free! A donation for food & gas if you partake in the food or carpool is appreciated.

Time: 10:00am - 9:00pm (It's all day)

 

We have been invited to take part in a day of gaming in Derry, NH. It's about a 1 hour drive from Portsmouth.

Many different types of games will be played and I am sure there will be something for everyone. If you are looking for any particular games please ask and we will see what we can do to wrangle them up.

Please feel free to bring gaming friendly snacks for yourself, and to share. There is a small fridge, and microwave onsite.

If you are interested in carpooling please let me know.

 

Hope you can join us!

 

Wayne
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in the area around the back right side of the building.

group.name: The Portsmouth, NH / Seacoast Boardgames Group

item.name: Memorial Day Games with Southern NH Open Board Gamers
